description:
Add a touch of style and luxury to your home with the luxuriously rich foaming hand wash.

Palmolive Foaming hand wash soap is made with 100% natural sweet almond oil and botanical extracts in a calming scent of Vanilla & Sweet Almond.

Relax with this calming and balanced scent of Vanilla, caramel and sandalwood notes.

The rich lather with gentle, effective cleansing, removes germs, leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth.

Contains More of what you love, and less of what you don't.

That's why this liquid hand wash is free from:
- No Parabens.
- No Phthalates.
- No Mineral oil.
- No Alcohol.
- No Soap.
- No Animal Derived Ingredients.
- No Gluten.
- No Silicones.
- No BPA.

Please recycle. This bottle is recyclable, made with 66% less plastic*.

Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash is suitable for the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

Size: 1L Refill
Better for your wallet, and better for the planet*.

* vs 2.5 x Palmolive Vanilla + Sweet Almond Foam Pump 400mL



Product Features:

  • NOURISHING HAND WASH SOAP: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash with Vanilla & Sweet Almond is gentle and nourishing on the skin.
  • NATURAL EXTRACTS: made with 100 percent sweet almond oil and contains botanical extracts in a calming scent.
  • CALMING AND BALANCED SCENT: Relax with this calming and balanced scent of Vanilla, caramel and sandalwood notes.
  • ALCOHOL FREE: Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash Soap formula does not contain ethanol
  • RECYCLABLE: This product is made in a recyclable bottle, recycle with cap on.
name: Palmolive 1L
